edu.uga.cs1302.mp3manager
Class MP3Collection

java.lang.Object
  edu.uga.cs1302.mp3manager.MP3Collection

public class MP3Collection
extends java.lang.Object

MP3Collection created the collection of MP3Files and the array for the sort method and binarySearch method.

Constructor Summary

          Create an empty collection.

          Create a collection containing files in the specified directory.

Constructor Detail

MP3Collection

public MP3Collection()
Create an empty collection. It is public so it can be used in other classes.

MP3Collection

public MP3Collection(java.lang.String directoryPathname)
Create a collection containing files in the specified directory. The collection should include only files with the .mp3 extension.

Parameters:
directoryPathname - the directory to obtain the MP3Files from
Method Detail

sort

public void sort(java.util.Comparator comp)
Sort the collection according to the given comparator. Calls the quickSort method. It is public so it can be called from other classes.

Parameters:
comp - The Comparator needed to do the comparison

binarySearch

public int binarySearch(MP3File file,
                        java.util.Comparator comp)
Search for a given mp3 file, using the given comparator. Return the index of the file in the collection or -1 if not found. The collection must be sorted using the same comparator. It is public so it can be called from other classes.

Parameters:
file - MP3File to search for
comp - appropriate Comparator needed to do the comparison
Returns:
the index of the file if found in the collection, or -1 if not found

size

public int size()
Return the size of the collection. It is public so it can be called from other classes.

Returns:
the size of the collection

getFile

public MP3File getFile(int index)
                throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
Return an MP3File at the given index position in the collection. Throw an IndexOutOfBoundsException exception if the index value is out of bounds. It is public so it can be called from other classes.

Parameters:
index - where to look for the MP3File
Returns:
the MP3File at the specified index
Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is out of bounds

play

public void play(int index)
          throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
Start playing a file at a given index position. Throw an IndexOutOfBoundsException exception if the index value is out of bounds. It is public so it can be called from other classes.

Parameters:
index -
Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
